Package sorcer.core.monitor

Interface Summary
MonitorManagement An interface to be implemented by a monitoring service.
MonitorSessionManagement A server side session manager.
MonitorUIManagement An interface for UI to interact with the monitor.
 

Class Summary
MonitorableSession A proxy for controlling the session in the server.
MonitorEvent Monitor Event is passed back by MonitorManager to notify the Service Broker about any monitoring events.
